aws:requesttag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags that are passed in the request

aws:resourcetag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by the tags associated with the resource

aws:tagkeys.description: Filters access by the tag keys that are passed in the request

s3express:accesspointnetworkorigin.description: Filters access by the network origin (Internet or VPC)

s3express:allaccessrestrictedtolocalzone.description: Filters access by AWS Local Zone network border group(s) provided in this condition key

s3express:buckettag/${tagkey}.description: Filters access by tag key-value pairs attached to the bucket

s3express:dataaccesspointaccount.description: Filters access by the AWS Account ID that owns the access point

s3express:dataaccesspointarn.description: Filters access by an access point Amazon Resource Name (ARN)

s3express:locationname.description: Filters access by a specific Availability Zone or Local Zone ID

s3express:permissions.description: Filters access by the permission requested by Access Point Scope configuration, such as GetObject, PutObject

s3express:resourceaccount.description: Filters access by the resource owner AWS account ID

s3express:sessionmode.description: Filters access by the permission requested by CreateSession API, such as ReadOnly and ReadWrite

s3express:tlsversion.description: Filters access by the TLS version used by the client

s3express:signatureage.description: Filters access by the age in milliseconds of the request signature

s3express:signatureversion.description: Filters access by the AWS Signature Version used on the request

s3express:x-amz-content-sha256.description: Filters access by unsigned content in your bucket

s3express:x-amz-server-side-encryption-a.description: Filters access by AWS KMS customer managed key for server-side encryption
